EXCITED TO SHARE that yours truly after 12 years and 400 clients served, has taken a leap to become a solo ��Real Estate Agent!!
Years and years of being on a team I am so thankful for the education, experience and opportunity to build my own business. I ❤️ REFERRALS!!
This has been such an adventure for me and I look forward to many, many more years of service!!��
As always, IF YOU OR ANYONE YOU KNOW IS LOOKING TO MAKE A MOVE or has any questions real estate related, please do not hesitate to share my info and/or contact me, I AM NEVER TOO BUSY TO HELP!!

With a passion for Real Estate, a drive to exceed expectations and serve others, Kristy fits right into the family at RE/MAX Professionals. Kristy delivers the highest level of service, provides the most up to date information on the market and will show a true commitment to the best interests of her clients at ALL TIMES.  Kristy is a dedicated, trustworthy representative with EXPERT negotiation skills. She has a positive attitude and works outside the box to ensure an experience you will want to tell your friends and family about. With over 12 years experience selling/listing Real Estate in Arizona, Kristy knows how important it is to mirror the pace her clients desire, whether they buy or sell today, or in the future... Give her a call TODAY!!Kristy Montognese RE/MAX Professionals623-523-1980HOMESBYKRISTY.COMKRISTY@HOMESBYKRISTY.COM
